frame.name: Detaining
frame.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Authorities</fen> hold a <fen>Suspect</fen> under suspicion of having committed a crime (<fen>Charges</fen>). The <fen>Holding_location</fen> and period of detention (<fen>Duration</fen>) may also be specified. <ex><fex name="Authorities">The police</fex> <t>held</t> <fex name="Suspect">Mr. Smith</fex> <fex name="Holding_location">in the slammer</fex> <fex name="Charges">on charges of killing his lawyer</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Charges
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the crime with which the <fen>Suspect</fen> is charged.</def-root>

FE.name: Suspect
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the person who is taken into custody and held, under suspicion of having committed a crime.</def-root>

FE.name: Holding_location
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Suspect</fen> is confined. <ex><fex name="Suspect">Marge</fex> was under <t>arrest</t> <fex name="Hold_L">in the county jail</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the length of time that the <fen>Suspect</fen> spends in confinement.</def-root>

FE.name: Legal_basis
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the law, act, or precedent that allows the <fen>Authorities</fen> to detain the <fen>Suspect</fen>. <ex><fex name="Authorities">The government</fex> <t>held</t> <fex name="Suspect">him</fex> <fex name="Basis">under the Why Not Act</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which the <fen>Authorities</fen> detain a <fen>Suspect</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Dependent_state
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the state of the <fen>Suspect</fen> being held. <ex><fex name="Suspect">Snake</fex> was <t>held</t> <fex name="Dependent_state">in communicado</fex>.</ex></def-root>
